mdRecord.dcterms:title: Blood detection tablets
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ames Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Brown glass bottle with red metal cap filled with Hematest Reagent Tablets. Label Information: 60 tablets; Stock No. 6505-110-6575; Blood detection tablets; Hematest Reagent Tablets; Pat. No. 2,290,436; Active ingredients: Calcium Acetate, Tartaric Acid, Strontium Peroxide, Ortholtolidin; Ames Company, Inc., Elkhart, Indiana, U.S.A. Instructions on back of bottle and separate sheet included. Filter paper for testing included.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
